node.title: We Never Saw Anything Like This!
node.description: How amazing it would have been to be alive during the time of Christ’s ministry on earth! In this message on a miracle of Jesus we trace the Savior’s footsteps in and around the town of Capernaum, on the north shore of the Sea of Galilee. As we break down the story of the healing of the paralytic, we find that the greatest miracle of all is a miracle Christ is still performing today!
